headline.title: Build an education that builds the world.

section_1.text: We’re a private university dedicated to creating Pioneers who will make a difference. With 14 schools and colleges located in central Denver, we serve over 11,000 graduate and undergraduate students. Our classroom academics, hands_on educational experiences, and global learning adventures put students on the path toward lives and careers that will shape the world.

slides.text: I love DU. It’s big enough that I could discover so many new things but small enough that I don’t feel like a face in the crowd.
slides.cite: Zane Sanchez <small>Dual Degree in Accountancy, Class of '16</small>

slides.text: The community has empowered me and given me the confidence in myself ... to make huge changes.
I got to study abroad in Ghana, which expanded my views and made me more globally minded. I realized how influential I could be around the world.
slides.cite: Cameron Simmons <small>Class of '16, Black Student Alliance President</small>

paragraphs.text: Our education takes you out of the classroom and into communities where you can learn by making an impact. Our academic programs integrate with real_world learning, connecting with the professional environments you’ll strive towards after graduation.

We’re an active research university, developing knowledge to tackle challenges worldwide. Whether you’re researching Alzheimer’s, sustainable technologies or the needs of underserved communities, you’ll have the resources and support to make your discoveries at home and abroad.

cols.description: countries are home to DU alum

paragraphs.text: It’s about finding your place, and we have a niche for almost everyone. For our Pioneers, new opportunities and lifelong relationships are rewards for the courageous and collaborative. From joining a club, improving local communities, or exploring Colorado’s natural landscape, your experiences will shape your future.
